00023 public function init()
00024     {
00025  $this->objouputtext = $this->getObject('language_module','hosportal');
00026  //Instantiate the language object
00027  $this->objDBComments = $this->getObject('dbhosportal_messages','hosportal');
00028    //instatiate form module object
00029   $this->objbuildform = $this->getObject('form_module','hosportal');
00030      //instatiate HTML table module object
00031   $this->objHTMLTable = $this->getObject('htmltable_module','hosportal');
00032   //instatiate a icon object
00033   $this->objIcon = $this->getObject('icon_module','hosportal');
00034   //instatiate confirm object
00035   $this->objConfirm = $this->getObject('confirm_module','hosportal');
00036   //instatiate link object
00037   $this->objLink = $this->getObject('link_module','hosportal');
00038   //instatiate a user object
00039  $this->objUser = $this->getObject('user_module','hosportal');
00040  $this->objSwitchMenu = $this->getObject('switchmenu_module','hosportal');
00041 
00042 $this->objDropDownMenu = $this->getObject('dropdown_module', 'hosportal');
00043   //load button object
00044   $this->objBuildButton = $this->getObject('button_module','hosportal');
00045     //Load text input object
00046   $this->objTitle = $this->getObject('textinput_module','hosportal');
00047   //Load label object
00048   $this->objLabel = $this->getObject('label_module','hosportal');
00049 
00050     }

00064 protected function setUpDropDown()
00065 {
00066 
00067    // $dd= $this->getObject('dropdown', 'htmlelements');
00068    $this->objDropDownMenu->createNewObjectFromModule('DropDown');
00069    //=&new dropdown('noOfMessagesDropDown');
00070   // $dd->addOption()    will add a blank option
00071 for ($x=1;$x<10;$x++)
00072 {
00073      $this->objDropDownMenu->insertOptionIntoDropDown($x,$x);
00074 }
00075 //$this->objDropDownMenu->setBreakSpace('&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;');
00076 //$this->objDropDownMenu->addOption('1','2');
00077 //   $this->objDropDownMenu->addOption('2','5');
00078    $this->objDropDownMenu->setDefaultOptionForDropDown(2);
00079   return $this->objDropDownMenu->showBuildDropDownMenu();
00080 
00081 //$this->objDropDownMenu->setSelected($this->getSession('mydropdown'));
00082 }

00087 protected function setGoToForumLink($action = 'viewForum')
00088 {
00089   //  $lnkSortAuthorAsc = $this->objouputtext->insertTextFromConfigFile("mod_hosportal_sortauthoracs");
00090 
00091  $lnkSortAuthorAsc = $this->objouputtext->insertTextFromConfigFile("mod_hosportal_gotohosportalheading");
00092     $mngSortAuthorAscLink = $this->objLink->createNewObjectFromModule($this->uri(array(
00093     'module'=>'hosportal',
00094     'action'=>$action,
00095    )));
00096      $mngSortAuthorAscLink = $this->objLink->embedLinkToObject($lnkSortAuthorAsc) ;
00097    return  $link1Manage = $mngSortAuthorAscLink = $this->objLink->showLink();
00098 }

00311 protected function setSortAuthorAscLink($action = 'sortnview', $idSubjectMatter=NULL, $noOfMessages = 1)
00312 {
00313     $lnkSortAuthorAsc = $this->objouputtext->insertTextFromConfigFile("mod_hosportal_sortauthoracs");
00314 
00315     $mngSortAuthorAscLink = $this->objLink->createNewObjectFromModule($this->uri(array(
00316     'module'=>'hosportal',
00317     'action'=>$action,
00318     'sortOptions' => "sortAuthorsAscendingOrder",
00319      'idSubjectMatter'=> $idSubjectMatter,
00320         'pageNumber' => 0,
00321         'noOfMessages'=> $noOfMessages,
00322         'searchBoolean' => false
00323    )));
00324      $mngSortAuthorAscLink = $this->objLink->embedLinkToObject($lnkSortAuthorAsc) ;
00325    return  $link1Manage = $mngSortAuthorAscLink = $this->objLink->showLink();
00326 }
